description: This file defines CMake functions for converting JSON strings to CMake-compatible strings, including handling escape sequences and removing quotation marks.

methods.name: json_string_to_cmake
methods.description: Converts a JSON string to a CMake string, handling escape sequences and removing surrounding quotes.

methods.name: json_string_ref_to_cmake
methods.description: Converts a reference to a JSON string into a CMake string by dereferencing and then processing.
